Item.Code: Calculate Murex IPV Repo Margin IsinPosition Flag

CellDefinition.Value: IF(ISERROR(TenorDate) OR ISERROR(MaxMaturity), NULL, TenorDate <= MaxMaturity)
IF(ISERROR(TenorDate) OR ISERROR(MaxMaturity) OR FirstTenorDtAfterMaxMat = -99999, NULL, CheckTenorDate)
PositionCurve.Values( Column_1.|Tenor Date|.Data(StartDate), Column_1 ).Where( Column_1 <> NULL ).SORT(1)
IF(CheckMaxMat, CurveTenorDatesAsIntSorted.Values(IF(Column_1 > MaxMaturity, Column_1, NULL)).Where(Column_1 NOT NULL)[1], -99999)

DatabaseItems(DatabaseName,"Murex Positions Repo Margins","Murex Position Repo Margin", Instrument + '_*').Values( Reference, Code, |Maximum Maturity|( 'Murex' ).Data( StartDate ), |Transaction Group|( 'Murex' ) ).SORTBY( |Maximum Maturity|( 'Murex' ).Data( StartDate ) DESC )
IF(Check = NULL, NULL, Values(StartDate, Check.CBOOL).MAKESERIES(0,1)) OR IF(CheckNext = NULL, NULL, Values(StartDate, CheckNext.CBOOL).MAKESERIES(0,1))
IF(ISERROR(Check) AND ISERROR(CheckNext), NULL, Values(StartDate, Check.CBOOL OR CheckNext.CBOOL).MAKESERIES(0,1))
Item('\\xTSSERVERx\MD_SILVER','ABNA1.125+01/32_21M_EURBND','Murex Repo Margin').Values( Item('MD_SILVER',instrument,'Murex Position Repo Margin') .Maximum Maturity.LastValue,|Tenor Date|.LastValue)
-- LastDate -- Set Position Curve property to "Store Changes Only"
IF(Check = NULL, NULL, Values(StartDate, Check.CBOOL).MAKESERIES(0,1)) OR IF(CheckNext = NULL, NULL, Values(StartDate, CheckNext.CBOOL).MAKESERIES(0,1))
